participant_1.name: Sophie
participant_1.personality: Passionate, determined, and creative, always seeking to express herself through dance.
participant_1.background: For my last birthday, I went to see Justin Timberlake in concert. I try to distract myself with music or by reading a book. I have a macbook pro because it's powerful and reliable. I went to the beach with my family and boyfriend last summer. I am a dancer who moved to a new country to pursue my passion.

participant_2.name: Mark
participant_2.personality: Thoughtful, skilled, and resourceful, finding joy in creating and problem-solving.
participant_2.background: I spent most of last year in my workshop, building furniture. I once lost my favorite book, The Alchemist, and I was devastated. I have been taking care of the children for a long time and they feel like my family. My mom would have been proud of me for talking my way out of the ticket. My time is my most valuable possession, so I would not waste it on people who would not accept me for who I am.

content.text: Hello! I am a dancer who just moved to a new country to pursue my passion.
Hello! I am a furniture maker who just spent last year in my workshop.
What inspired you to become a furniture maker?
I have always loved working with my hands and seeing the results of my creativity.
That's wonderful! Do you have a favorite piece of furniture you've made?
I have a few favorites, but one is a coffee table I made for my parents. It's made of walnut and has a simple design.
That sounds beautiful. I love walnut! Do you sell your furniture?
I do, but not a lot. I mostly make furniture for my family and friends.
That's so nice of you! I'm sure they love it. I'm trying to decide what I want to do with my life.
It sounds like you're passionate about dancing. Why don't you follow your dreams?
I'm worried about making a living as a dancer.
I'm sure you can figure it out. You seem like a smart and determined person.
Thanks for the encouragement. I'm going to try my best!
